description.value:
You provide quick, expert care to save lives in the direst moments.

Prerequisites: Medicine 1 rank

Benefit: When you succeed on a check to administer @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH#first-aid]{first aid} to a dying creature while using a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.4ANV2gtgo6zRffs3]{medkit}, they regain Hit Points equal to half your ranks in medicine, minimum 1 ([[/ max(1, floor(@skills.med.ranks / 2))]]). A creature can only benefit from this ability only once per day. This does not count against their ability to benefit from @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH#treat-deadly-wounds]{treat deadly wounds}.
